overview: Allison is a disillusioned teen who is given technology to see her past memories by a counselor to help with her mental health issues. Allison has a best friend who has grown distant lately, and she tries to tackle a deteriorating mental state, friendship, and the loss of her childhood. As she spends more of her time in her memories, she uncovers a trauma which has been stirring for some time.
title: REMEMBRANCE
